name: Ancient Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon
text: Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon + Ancient Dark Magician + Ancient Blue-Eyes White, This card can only be summoned by fusing the aboce materials using the effect of "Ancient Power Released", Oce per turn quick effect You can discard 1 "burst stream destruction" or 1 "Ancient burst stream destruction" if you do banish all monsters your opponent controls. "Ancient Blue-Eyes Light Dragoon" can not attack the turn it uses this effect. This card is uneffected by card effects. Once per turn during your main phase target one card in your opponents hand; banish that card if it was a monster gain life points equal too half that monsters ATK.
